body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to CarMart Customer Support. My name is Richard Edwards, and I will be assisting you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Sarah Brooks.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. How may I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five - six seven eight - nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Could you also confirm your email address for us, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for providing that information, Sarah. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. Thank you for contacting CarMart Customer Support. Have a great day!
